# Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge

We are committed to making participation in this project a respectful experience for everyone.

## Standards

**Positive behavior:**
- Constructive criticism of theory and claims
- Respectful disagreement with clear reasoning
- Focusing on logic and evidence, not persons
- Acknowledging when arguments are valid

**Unacceptable behavior:**
- Personal attacks or insults
- Dismissing work without engagement
- Bad-faith arguments
- Harassment of any kind

## Scope

This applies to all project spaces: issues, pull requests, discussions.

## Enforcement

Violations may result in removal from the project.

## Attribution

Adapted from the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/).
